products.title: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo blackout latte brown roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 7.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This soft latte brown roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This light brown roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Konya Blackout Chocolate Brown
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout chocolate brown roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackoutchocolate brown plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Hazel - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), hazel - roller blind origin (blackout) hazel is a fabric that's true to its name and more than happy in any contemporary home. It's that gentle woody brown that really lifts the depth and character of a room to new heights that we love,
products.productdescription: Origin (blackout) hazel is a fabric that's true to its name and more than happy in any contemporary home. It's that gentle woody brown that really lifts the depth and character of a room to new heights that we love, and we know you're going to fall in love with it too.Take your time when figuring out how to work hazel into your chosen space by thinking about ways you can pair it with deep creams and sandy beiges. This will help create a natural symphony of colour that brings any space to life.

products.title: Dark Brown (4559) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure dark brown (4559) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.
